feed.title: One on One
feed.subtitle: One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast, specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.title: Social Media Exclusive: NBA Finals Game 5 Reaction with Lucas Jafet of Share the Rock - Season 1 Bonus

link.title: Social Media Exclusive: NBA Finals Game 5 Reaction with Lucas Jafet of Share the Rock - Season 1 Bonus

entry.content:
In this Social Media Exclusive, Jack and Noah are joined live on Instagram with Lucas Jafet of the Share the Rock Podcast after the Warriors win Game 5 of the NBA Finals. The guys discuss the dominance of Andrew Wiggins, the Celtics’ turnover issues, and look ahead to Game 6 on Thursday.

Don’t forget to follow One on One on Instagram to see these Social Media Exclusives live!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Social Media Exclusive: NBA Finals Game 5 Initial Reaction - Season 1 Bonus

link.title: Social Media Exclusive: NBA Finals Game 5 Initial Reaction - Season 1 Bonus

entry.content:
In this Social Media Exclusive, Jack and Noah give their thoughts on Game 5 of the NBA Finals the Warriors tied the series at 2 Steph Curry scored 43 how do the Celtics respond and who will capture the championship with a possible 3 games remaining.

Don’t forget to follow One on One on Instagram to see these Social Media Exclusives live!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Finals breakdown after 2 games, Snyder out of Utah, Ham introduced in LA - Season 1 Episode 14

link.title: Finals breakdown after 2 games, Snyder out of Utah, Ham introduced in LA - Season 1 Episode 14

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss a wild first two games of the NBA Finals, and look ahead to the remainder of the series. Then, the guys talk about Quin Snyder stepping down as Jazz head coach and debate Darvin Ham’s new challenge of coaching LeBron and AD with the Lakers.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Social Media Exclusive: NBA Finals Game 2 Reaction - Season 1 Bonus

link.title: Social Media Exclusive: NBA Finals Game 2 Reaction - Season 1 Bonus

entry.content:
In this Social Media Exclusive, Jack and Noah give their thoughts on game 2 of the NBA Finals between the Celtics and the Warriors. Golden State makes the series 1-1 and the guys discuss where the series goes from here!

Don’t forget to follow One on One on Instagram to see these Social Media Exclusives live!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: Social Media Exclusive: Celtics shoot the lights out in the fourth quarter, take 1-0 lead in the NBA Finals - Season 1 Bonus

link.title: Social Media Exclusive: Celtics shoot the lights out in the fourth quarter, take 1-0 lead in the NBA Finals - Season 1 Bonus

entry.content:
In this Social Media Exclusive, Golden State led by 15 in the second half, but Boston made a furious comeback and won the series opener on the road. Check out Noah and Jack’s thoughts on Game 1.

Don’t forget to follow One on One on Instagram to see these Social Media Exclusives live!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: NBA Finals Preview as Celtics and Warriors meet in Heavyweight Clash - Season 1 Episode 13

link.title: NBA Finals Preview as Celtics and Warriors meet in Heavyweight Clash - Season 1 Episode 13

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah break down the 2022 NBA Finals, which begin Thursday from San Francisco. They break down how the series might play out on the floor and discuss the legacies at stake. Then, they discuss some of the best and worst champion teams of the past.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Social Media Exclusive: Boston wins Game 7 on the road in Miami, Celtics will meet Warriors in The Finals - Season 1 Bonus

link.title: Social Media Exclusive: Boston wins Game 7 on the road in Miami, Celtics will meet Warriors in The Finals - Season 1 Bonus

entry.content:
For our sixth Social Media Exclusive, Jack and Noah go live and discuss Boston’s 4 point win over the Heat in Game 7 of the Eastern Conference Finals and look ahead to the Celtics’ upcoming series with Golden State in the NBA Finals.

Don’t forget to follow One on One on Instagram to see these Social Media Exclusives live!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: Social Media Exclusive: Heat Force Game 7, Warriors Advance to Finals, and Lakers New Head Coach! - Season 1 Bonus

link.title: Social Media Exclusive: Heat Force Game 7, Warriors Advance to Finals, and Lakers New Head Coach! - Season 1 Bonus

entry.content:
For our fifth Social Media Exclusive, Jack and Noah go live and discuss game 6 of Heat vs Celtics in the Eastern Conference Finals, the Warriors advancing to the finals as well as the Lakers new head coach.

Note: We apologize for the technical difficulties with the audio.

Don’t forget to follow One on One on Instagram to see these Social Media Exclusives live!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: Conference Finals Overview and Top 10 Players Remaining in the Playoffs - Season 1 Episode 12

link.title: Conference Finals Overview and Top 10 Players Remaining in the Playoffs - Season 1 Episode 12

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss both conference finals matchups, the Warriors are a win away from the finals, and who has the best chance between the Celtics and the Heat. They also discuss the top 10 players remaining on the 3 title favorites.

Note: This episode was recorded before Game 4 for Celtics vs Heat.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: C’s and Mav’s advance, what’s next for Philly and Phoenix, Conference Final previews - Season 1 Episode 11

link.title: C’s and Mav’s advance, what’s next for Philly and Phoenix, Conference Final previews - Season 1 Episode 11

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah break down the utter dominance of Grant Williams and Luka Doncic, discuss the Sixers and Suns collapsing in the second round, and look ahead to Celtics-Heat and Warriors-Mavs.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
